@kentcdodds @mrkurt @Netlify @vercel @flydotio The UI team's concerns are decoupled from the infra team's and they work in Jamstackland (which is a theme park we may or may not one day open) While the teams working on the APIs are in more traditional stacks and deal with very different challenges.
